alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Haralson; Paulding (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 5:11PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Paulding, northeastern Haralson and northeastern Carroll Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 510 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near New Georgia, or 9 miles southwest of Dallas, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Dallas, Villa Rica, Temple, Hiram, Braswell, Yorkville, Draketown and New Georgia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
